sections.purpose: To observe microorganisms and stained slides with two eyepieces for better depth and comfort.
sections.scope: Applicable to microscopic examination in Microbiology.
procedure: Place the microscope on a flat surface and plug into a power source.
Switch ON the light source and adjust the intensity.
Place the slide on the stage and secure with the specimen holder.
Start with the lowest power objective (4x or 10x).
Adjust the interpupillary distance and diopter settings for your eyes.
Use the coarse and fine adjustment knobs to focus the image.
Rotate the nosepiece to higher power objectives as needed.
Apply immersion oil only for the 100x objective.
Lower the stage and remove the slide after use.
Clean the lenses with lens paper and switch OFF the light.
precautions: Never use the coarse focus with the high-power or oil immersion objectives.
Always wipe oil off the 100x lens immediately after use.
Do not touch the glass part of the lenses with your fingers.
Carry the microscope with both hands (one on the arm, one on the base).
Store the microscope with a dust cover.
